data.name: A Hat in Time - B-Side Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
You asked for it, we're delivering - all new remixes, lost, beta & wip tracks, extended tracks and more! 120 tracks!
Music from any future content will be added to this soundtrack (whenever possible).

Includes the soundtrack from the Seal the Deal DLC!

Tracklist:

A Hat in Time B-Side - 01 Main Theme (Remix) VGR
A Hat in Time B-Side - 02 Through Time and Space (Main Theme Remix) Gario
A Hat in Time B-Side - 03 Scootin' Through My Subconscious Mind (Scootin' Through Subcon Forest Remix) Chimpazilla
A Hat in Time B-Side - 04 I Am Bird (You Are Now Legally a Bird Remix) Theory Of N
A Hat in Time B-Side - 05 Picture Perfect B-Side (Remix) Pascal Michael Stiefel
A Hat in Time B-Side - 06 Scootin' Thru Mafia Town (Remix) LongBoxofChocolate
A Hat in Time B-Side - 07 The Lava Cake Peak (Remix) Julia Henderson
A Hat in Time B-Side - 08 Freight Car Frenzy (Train Rush Remix) Jasper
A Hat in Time B-Side - 09 Sand 'n Sails Heatgusts (Remix) Carlos Eiene
A Hat in Time B-Side - 10 You Are All Bad Guys (Remix) Laura Platt
A Hat in Time B-Side - 11 Subcon Village B-Side (Remix) Echorobot
